cause.description: Simply Smiles is dedicated to providing bright futures for impoverished children at orphanages around the world. Simply Smiles works each and every day to provide loving homes, appropriate educations, and every chance at happy and successful lives for the untold millions of impoverished children in our world. Our approach is simple. We support individuals who have been discarded by society, or even their own families, and give them everything they need physically and emotionally. We believe creating just one smile on an abandoned child's face can change their life forever. We've seen it a thousand times, and we cherish each and every time a child Simply Smiles... Learn more at www.SimplySmiles.org 1. Children deserve loving homes, appropriate educations and every chance at happy and successful lives
